DOC.brief_summary: The objective feasibility study demonstrate device safe potentially efficacious use patient undergoing high risk Percutaneous Coronary Interventions ( PCI ) .Patients enrol meet inclusion & exclusion criterion .
DOC.brief_title: PROTECT I , A Prospective Feasibility Trial Investigating Use IMPELLA RECOVER LP 2.5 System Patients Undergoing High Risk PCI
DOC.criteria: Signed Informed Consent Non emergent PCI least one de novo restenotic lesion native coronary vessel bypass graft EF < 35 % ST Myocardial Infarction Cardiac Arrest Cardiogenic Shock Thrombus Left Ventricle
